value.0: Eventually a vampire learns all there is to know from vampire lore and must find their own path. The elder vampire has tricks and abilities only whispered within the darkest rumors. As an elder vampire you will be given a book of advancement every 4 levels starting at level 21, make your choices carefully as there is no turning back once you have chosen a new ability. Choose an ability below for it's description and a chance to learn it.

As powerful as it is, the improved thrall is fodder for an unholy thrall. The ritual to create an unholy thrall imbues it with much of your vampiric powers while allowing the original host's body to twist your power in chaotic ways. The thrall receives various immunities, aura's and resistances which only grow stronger as you do. There are rumors that the ritual can be perfected though, that the thrall could become a perfect servant in every way...

Emotions eventually burn out and weaken so stronger powers are needed. All of your summoning experience has culminated in finding creatures that will cause anyone to tremble. The innocent looking undead slime, the malicious hand of evil and even the terrifying ancient shadow dragon await your call.

The sun, a burning orb whose direct light will burn even an elder vampire to ashes in mere minutes can be overcome. Your long research has determined a way to bind a shadow to yourself, thus the sun can never directly shine upon you. True, the shadow will make others ask questions, but you are strong enough that enemies are no longer a problem...

Tired of people interrupting you as you head towards your coffin, your refuge, you've developed a spell to instantly transport you there and disable or destroy your enemies at the same time. Your poor foes will suffer from an illusion of themselves and their allies turning upon each other. So you cannot get caught in your own spell, you've made sure your coffin must be placed far from wherever you cast Refuge.

You have proven them false, a vampire can be redeemed. Your journey to being recognized by the good gods has been long, but with their blessings you can again be healed like any normal mortal. You actually receive the best of both worlds, both negative and positive energies will restore you.

Note: You will lose the blessing of the good gods if your alignment is no longer 'Good'

Long hours of study have finally shown you the method to create a perfect thrall every time. A thrall with continual haste, multiple auras, massive resists, every known immunity, and boosted statistics. Even you as the master may not have a chance against your own creation, it is only dependent on whom you choose to be your thrall.

You have always looked hungrily upon blood and that hungry look serves you even better now. With the minor telekinesis you've developed you can pull the lost blood of those you have wounded to yourself during battle. You've even practiced enough that storing the extra blood takes no time at all. Your only limitation seems to be that you can only perform this feat a few times per day, perhaps more practice will allow you to pull this off more often...

As powerful as the children of the night are, there comes a time when more power is needed. Reaching into unknown planes you have discovered the essences of dark emotions. Pain that will tear men to shreds, vengence that is always prepared to strike back and even hate will join you for a time to destroy as much as it can. Only your iron will can keep them form turning on you, but your instinct tells you there are even more powerful beings awaiting your call.

Experience has taught you that zombies are no longer powerful enough, with your knowledge and power you can enslave the body with it's form and abilities intact. Without mental restraints the enslaved thrall will also grow in power as you do. Though powerful, an improved thrall is merely the first step of three towards the most unholy thrall, a servant that will destroy all who stand against you.
Long hours of practice and an uncountable number of headaches have finally allowed you to double the number of times you can pull the woundeds blood to you.

Delving into the souls of your victims has shown you the differences between the mortal and immortal soul. With this knowledge you have developed a method to hide the true nature of your soul so you'll never need to fear the godly powers of a cleric again. You can no longer be turned.

Evil begets evil, as an elder vampire you are powerful enough to summon creatures from other planes and realms of existance. Some, like the plague rat, join you willingly to spread their filth and disease. Others, like the spider lord, must be ripped out of their home plane and bound to serve you in the destruction of all who face you. Either way you only have enough power to keep them on this plane of existence for a few short hours, then again, with their power you will not need them more than that...will you?

Having tired of the blood hunger your research has discoved an untapped source that will forever quench your thrist. With the patience of the immortal you have trained your body to pull blood from the soil. Blood both recently and long ago spilt is constantly pulled into your body, regenerating you and preventing the need to ever drain a living being again. Your technique is not yet perfect, but improvement is something that will have to be decided upon later.
Through further practice and training you have discoved how to pull blood from the land at an increased rate. In fact, your body receives blood twice as quickly from the soil.
The mere touch of your undead mastery both determines that this book is of no use to you and burns it to dust in an instant. Your power is absolute, there is no reason to study any further.
The book crumbles to dust in your hands, rejecting your mortal body.
